title: Simple Phonebook
description:
Create a Phonebook class with:
- HashMap<String, String> field named contacts (name → phone)
- Constructor that initializes contacts
- addContact(String name, String phone) method
- getPhone(String name) method returning the phone number
instructions:
Create a Phonebook class with:
- HashMap<String, String> field named contacts (name → phone)
- Constructor that initializes contacts
- addContact(String name, String phone) method
- getPhone(String name) method returning the phone number

hints.text: Define a function using the java syntax. Don't forget the return statement if needed.
If stuck, try writing out the solution in plain English first, then convert to java code.
